Package jgj891_lab2

Class Fleet

java.lang.Object
jgj891_lab2.Fleet
public class Fleet extends Object
Fleet is a class that represents a fleet of starships. It creates a Fleet object with a fleetName and an ArrayList of Starship objects.
Author:
Sarthak Negi (jgj891) UTSA CS 3443 - Lab 2 Spring 2023

    • loadStarships

      public void loadStarships(String directoryName) throws FileNotFoundException
      Parameters:
      directoryName -
      Throws:
      FileNotFoundException - reads the crew members data from the given data file. creates the Starship and CrewMember objects with the data read from the data files. calls the function addCrewMember() to add the crew member object to its assigned ship. calls the function addStarship() to add the star ships to the fleet
